value.expression:

Admin Email Address: $vAdminEmailAddress$
User Email Address: $vUserEmailAddress$
Freight Approver Email Address: $vFreightApproverEmailAddress$
Tariff Approver Email Address: $vTariffApproverEmailAddress$

value.string: Automation: AP 3 Way Invoice Match - Failure

value.expression:
Hi Team,

AP 3 Way Invoice matching Bot has stopped execution due to one of the mandate value is missing in "BasicConfigFile.csv".

BasicConfigDetails.csv file path: $vFolderTemplates$

Here are the values for your ready reference:

Sharedrive Path: $vShareDrivePath$
Admin Email Address: $vAdminEmailAddress$
User Email Address: $vUserEmailAddress$
Freight Approver Email Address: $vFreightApproverEmailAddress$
Tariff Approver Email Address: $vTariffApproverEmailAddress$
Global Support Email Address: $vGlobalSupportEmailAddress$
Utilimaster Aurora Number: $vUtilimasterAurora$
AP 3 Way Match Number: $vAP3WayMatch$
Invoice Matching Number: $vInvoiceMatching$
Valid Supplier Email Domains: $vValidSupplierEmailDomains$

Please update the same.

Regards,
Bot
Error Message: $vErrorDescription$ at line $vErrorLineString$ in task name "$System:AATaskName$". Please refer screendhot: "ErrorScreen_$vTime$.png"
